meanings.definition: Highly advanced in complexity or refinement.
meanings.sent1: The supersophisticated technology amazed everyone at the science fair.
meanings.sent2: Her supersophisticated taste in art made her the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to act supersophisticated by wearing a top hat and monocle.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper's design was so supersophisticated, it seemed to touch the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The supersophisticated puzzle required hours of concentration to solve.

meanings.definition: Showing a high level of sophistication or complexity.
meanings.sent1: The supersophisticated party decorations impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: His supersophisticated language skills allowed him to communicate with people from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked supersophisticated wearing a tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were so supersophisticated, it was like watching poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The supersophisticated watch had intricate designs that caught everyone's eye.
